name: Caveman Youtube Progress Bar
description: Its a running caveman who trips on occasions and whose only running track is the youtube progres bar, he also has a spear to poke the end with.

user.name: DittoDino
user.about:
Ello there, I know basic HTML and CSS, though HTML is where I'm more advanced in, I'm also considering making multiple custom youtube progressbars, if you got any ideas for them, just message them in the discussion area and I'll see what I can do. 
My alt is BoopBop, made exclusively for roblox styles.

additional_info: If there are any techinal issues, just comment in the discussion, all you need to do turn this on is simply turn it on and the original gif is from Primal.If you got any more suggestions, just reply, I'll see what I can do. Update Notice Version 0.3 ~ September 16th 2021 Resized caveman to be smaller and on top of the progress bar. Version 0.2 ~ September 4th 2021 Bug fixes
